Class Planet

extends java.lang.Object
    The planet class contain a information attribute (name+description) and the main area

      • searchArea

        public boolean searchArea(java.lang.String name)
        Search an area name in the list the area is present in the hashmap
        Parameters:
        name - ( a string containing the name of the area than the user is looking for)
        Returns:
        true if there is a area of the same name than looked for in the hashmap esle return false
